extendedInfo.description: Long ago, the Summoners imagined a dragon. Ever since, the Nagella have reigned supreme over the night sky, striking fear into the heart of the bravest warrior.However, seemingly from nowhere, a World Power has risen up and declared that the Ancient World is passed. The New Kingdom of Sentreya, wielding the might of their New Magic, has rendered these once unrivaled beasts a mere inconvenience.But Ovid, Elsati soldier bearing the Silver-eyed Lion, looks at Sentreya and sees a nation blind to its own evils, in need of something to fear. Will he find a way to restore the Nagella to their former glory?If you enjoy this story please read D.J. Richter's others Elsati's Reward and Vampire Tree in the great new Fantasy in The Silver-eyed Lion Series.I Am PainD. J.
